content:
for the  UCSB mens water polo team  overall  Mountain Pacific Sports Federation this weekends Southern California Tournament in Irvine is a time of opportunity and a chance to make a major statement to other teams around the conference PERIOD

Of the  teams competing in the tournament  are nationally ranked in the top  PERIOD A strong Gaucho performance would legitimize its status as an elite team in the nation and put it up there with  USC  Cal  Stanford and  UCLA all of which will be competing in the tournament PERIOD Overall the top eight teams in the nation will be in the water at Irvine PERIOD

UCSB finds itself in a bracket with fourtime defending tournament champion USC as well as  Loyola Marymount University and the University of Redlands PERIOD Failing to win the bracket would mean the Gauchos would finish no higher than fifth so a win against USC is crucial if the team intends to finish among the elite PERIOD

Santa Barbara will get things going against LMU which it has already beaten twice this season PERIOD The Gauchos have outscored the Lions  in two meetings although the second match was considerably closer than the final score indicated PERIOD

In recent weeks the Gauchos fought off a frustrating midseason slide that saw them drop six of seven with five of those defeats coming by a single goal PERIOD As has been the case all year UCSB will turn to its senior leaders at key positions for this pivotal point in the season PERIOD Senior goalie Rick Wright senior 2meter Matt Dale and senior driver Ross Sinclair will be looked upon for leadership as they head into the homestretch of their final season PERIOD

The Gauchos first game against LMU is scheduled for  a.m PERIOD at the Corona del Mar High School Pool in Newport Beach Calif PERIOD Subsequent games are determined by results from other tournament games PERIOD
Print

Comments are closed PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
